name: BOLT Media Inc
tagline: They've never seen this side of you..
description:
BOLT Media is a award winning web design & development company based in Thunder Bay, ON with offices in London and Waterloo. Working with clients from all over the globe gives us a full and well rounded portfolio in which we can draw experience from. We are not your typical agency in a sense that we truly get to know our clients on a personal level allowing us to extract what our clients are really need out of a website.
Being a complete custom WordPress development agency gives our clients the piece of mind that they are not just getting a recycled, run of the mill type product.
